title: 求给op/warp权限的指令
author: rongqaq
txt_content:
我打了/mangaddp builder essentials.warp 
没想到身为op的自己也没有权限了 求怎么只给op有这权限

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
/manuadd PlayerName owner #移至最高组
  或者在控制台输入:manuadd PlayerName owner
 之后便拥有最高权限

replies.author: 魂梦归他处
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: rongqaq
replies.txt_content:
魂梦归他处 发表于 2014-4-22 21:30
LZ逗比= =   ess貌似自带的就是管理层可用吧
QAQ不行呀

replies.author: Notme.
replies.txt_content:
/manuaddp    [玩家ID]   Essentials.owner

最高权限组，如果帮助到你请给最佳噢
